name: Empowering Sweep
description: Swing your Aedric spear around with holy vengeance, dealing 2399 Physical Damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 1161 Physical Damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.  The duration is extended by 2 seconds for each enemy hit.    Gain Empower for the duration, increasing the damage of your Light and Heavy Attacks by 40%.
effectLines: Deals Physical damage. Duration is extended for each enemy hit.  Grants Empower for duration.

The duration is extended by 2 seconds for each enemy hit.    Gain Empower for the duration, increasing the damage of your Light and Heavy Attacks by 40%.
